nodes.text: Esme won't even look at me, let alone talk to me right now.
Thank you for saving my life the other night.
You vere almost dead vhen I found you. You vere very lucky I could still hear faint beating of your heart after I chased Drats off your body.
Take better care of yourself, Shawn. Is very sad to die from vermin. Is not a hero death.

nodes.message: Move this here, so Esme doesn't shift tone too abruptly.

options.text: Tell Esme that Gerhard Will Help Her
Tell Esme that Thomas Will Help Her
Tell Esme that Aeolus Loves Her

nodes.text: So, would you like to go for a stroll through the moonlight in the courtyard with me? We could follow it up with some cuddling by the fireplace afterwards... and maybe I'll try to steal a kiss from you.
Maybe I vill steal a few kisses from you, too.
We walked, we talked, we snuggled and hugged... It was a great way to spend an evening together.
And we shared some great kisses!
Vhat brings you to Hero-U? You do not seem like hero type.
I'll definitely want to speak more with Esme at some other time.
Vould you like to play vith me?
Would I ever!
Vhat game do you like? I am very good at cards.
I'm not sure what I want to say to her right now.
Vill you play Poobah vith us tonight? Is fun, but you must have Lyra to play.
I'll talk more to Esme later.
You did not do vell on test - aren't you vorried that you vill be expelled?
It was just a test. We can always do better the next time.
Nice vork on the test in class.
Thanks, I'm sure you'll do better next time.
I am not so sure as you.
I'm sure we can find a way for you to do better on the next test.
I hope you are right.
I hope I can think of something better to say to Esme later...
Vhat of you, Shawn? Vill you be looking for the thief?

options.text: Looking for the Thief Is a Waste of Time

nodes.text: How are we supposed to catch a thief - Watch everyone's every move to see if they are filching stuff? Hide behind a statue and hope the Thief sneaks by? Seems like a waste of time to me...
(shrug) I'll keep my eyes out for the Thief. I'll try to stop him if I can.
The sooner that Thief is caught, the better for us Disbarred Bards. He's just the excuse Terk was looking for to disband us.
Maybe I'll talk to Esme another time.
I am glad you caught thief. I vas afraid ve all vould have to leave here.
I am happy to be your hero any day, Esme.
Is very good Thomas caught thief. I was afraid ve vould all have to leave here.
Would you miss me?
Maybe I'll talk to Esme more another time.
Are you playing Poobah vith us tonight? Is best with many players.
Maybe I'll have more time to talk to Esme tomorrow.
Have you been down into Sea Caves, Shawn? Nasty, vet place.
I need to think about what to say to Esme.
You have made Sosi very angry! Good job!
Maybe I'll talk to her later.
Is thrilling that Katie got her treasure, isn't it?
I'm not sure what I want to say to Esme right now.
Katie says that no Rogue can ever be real hero. What do you say?
Yeah, sure, Rogues may do good deeds, but they do things for their own reasons. Rogues are like cats - they act for themselves.
I'll talk to Esme some other time when we have more to talk about.
Ah, so you are not so afraid of ghosts, Shawn!
There's not too much I want to say right now to Esme.
Shawn, I am thinking these Drats, they have something to do vith the vine cellar...
I have done much hunting of the Varrior Drats, but I do not find vhere they are yet.
I see that you, too, do not let Drats scare you avay.
I'll talk more with Esme some other time.
You vere right, Shawn. Aeolus is funny and clever guy.
I vonder who vill be big vinner tonight? Somehow, I do not think Sosi vill be doing very vell...
I'll talk more after the Poobah game.
Vhat about you, Shawn? Vill you be back here next semester?
Maybe I'll get a chance to talk to Esme later.
Vhere vere you the other night? Ve agreed to meet here after curfew.
Is little bit sad to think this might be the last time ve all play together, no?
Maybe I can talk to Esme later.
So vhy are we here? Vhat is it you vant? I mean, is it just a bit of cuddling or something more?
Shall we get the Poobah game started?
Yes, let us do so. I vant to vin.

nodes.message: GaveGift tag is set when a gift is offered. We might want to explain why you can't offer more than one gift per day.

nodes.text: Would you like to play a game of darts with me?
That vould be fun, yes.
Sorry, but you are too good for me now. You should try playing vith Katie. She is best at playing darts.
Very vell played - so many bullseyes you have made! I vill never be as good as darts as you are now.
You are getting so very good at darts now. Vell done!
Ha... you von! Good for you!
I vin! You vill need to try another time if you vish to beat me.
Would you like to play a game of Pool with me?
Yes, it vould be fun to play vith you.
Sorry, but you are too good at Pool for game to be fun now. You should be playing vith Joel.
This is stupid game... I hate it.
Is that vhat is supposed to happen vhen wrong billiard ball is in way? You make it look easy.
I think maybe you are getting better at this silly game than me.
You mean I vin? Is good to vin. Maybe you vin next time.
I am very good vith cards. You vill have to be very good to vin this game.
You are better at this card game now. Is no fun to play vith you.
I think you are best card game player now... but Joel may be better. Maybe not.. I do not think he plays vith all the cards on the table.
I did not think you vould play that trick vhen you did. You have outplayed me again!
Nice play! I admit my defeat by you, Shawn.
I varned you I vas good at this game.
Is that Panda you are vearing? Is very strange look.
Darn. I thought that I was beary charming. I guess it all de-pandas upon your point of view.
Maybe you should vear something other than pandas. You look like silly clown.
Alas, and here I thought I looked unbearably cute in this.
Still vith the pandas! Is hard to take you seriously.
Honey, I bear-lieve this is high koalaty panda perfection!
Oh, you look so good now. People vill think you must be very important person.
You think so? Thanks. I was hoping that I could get your approval for wearing this.
You look nice tonight, Shawn. Good clothes!
I thought I would dress for success.
I am liking the vay you are now dressing, Shawn. You look like you could charm like a Rover.
The only Rover I'd like to charm is you.
Of all people here in school, I am thinking that you are getting better and better. At least, you look like it.
Heh. I want to make a good impression.
Did you see the way Aeolus is looking at you while he performs? He thinks you are the woman of his dreams.
Vhat of you? Do you think I am amazing?
Not only are you amazing - you are the most wonderful woman I've ever met. I'm in love with you.
I thought you vere Katie's boyfriend, no? How can you love me if you love her? Maybe you are not very nice at all, Shawn. Maybe you cheat on Katie?
What are you two talking about?
Shawn just told me that he loved me.
Why, you cheating, lying, two-faced, piece of scum! Damn you to the depths! You should be keel-hauled and flogged with a cat!
But... but...
Shut up before I gut you right here and now.
Not another vord, or I'll tear out your throat!
I think maybe you are vonderful, too, Shawn. Maybe ve should talk about us a little later... in private.

options.text: Tell Esme that She is Amazing

nodes.text: Aeolus is right - I think you are a very special woman, Esme.
Aeolus may be goofy and weird, but he has good taste in women. You're quite the looker, Esme.
Aeolus is good Bard. Vhat do you think of him?
Aeolus is funny, clever, and sweet. He's fun to be around.
Maybe I should talk vith him then.
Aeolus is a slob who falls in and out of love at the drop of a key. I can't imagine anyone falling for him.
Esme, forget about Aeolus. I think you are the most wonderful person in the world! I love you.
I thought you vere Katie's boyfriend, no? How can you love me if you love her? Maybe you are not very nice at all, Shawn. Maybe you cheat on Katie?
What are you two talking about?
Shawn just told me that he loved me.
Why, you cheating, lying, two-faced, piece of scum! Damn you to the depths! You should be keel-hauled and flogged with a cat!
But... but...
Shut up, Shawn before I gut you right here and now.
Not another vord, or I'll tear out your throat!
You love me, Shawn? I like you, yes. You are good person. You are just not right person for me.
Maybe someday, you vill mean more to me. But for now, ve are just friends.
Aeolus has a crush on you. He thinks you're amazing.
Aeolus likes me? Aeolus has barely spoken to me. I barely know him.
Aeolus is a great guy. You'll like him once you get to know him.
The way Aeolus chases after every women he sees, it's hard to tell that he's only a half-Satyr.
